dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd - Copyright Infringement - again]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 2004 3:41 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd - Copyright Infringement - again]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd - Copyright Infringement - again
Date: Mon, 13 Dec 2004 22:57:10 +0000
From: Ian Hulme <ian.hulme@jagex.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

To whom it may concern,

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the intellectual property
rights. I have a good faith belief that the use of the material
identified below has not been authorized by the owner, its agents or the
law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or disable access to
it.

Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited
Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or Right: The software program
SCAR aswell as several references to the RuneScape name, copyright of Jagex
Ltd. 2002

Description of the Infringing Material: Download offerings of SCAR
(various versions)
available from website(s) listed below.

Location of the Infringing Material:

www.freerunescapeprograms.com/


Date: 13th December 2004

I can be contacted at:

Name: Ian Hulme
Title: Customer Support Team member
Company: Jagex Limited
Street Address: St John's Innovation Centre
City: Cambridge
State: England
Zip: CB4 0WS

Email: ian.hulme@jagex.com

I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the above information.

Regards,

Ian Hulme
Jagex Ltd.
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFBv13hvK/XpJs6oyURAqucAKCQR7Dsqel/8sXN0yoLlKBUFNGwyACeNz4D
mLaIsIZEtnLwIjqN1GlARyE=
=7gZF
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
